snippet: Mr. Pakledinaz was nominated 10 times for Tony Awards and won twice, for “Kiss Me, Kate” and “Thoroughly Modern Millie.” He also worked in opera, dance and regional theater.
abstract: Martin Pakledinaz, costume designer, dies at age 58.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Pakledinaz was nominated 10 times for Tony Awards and won twice, for “Kiss Me, Kate” and “Thoroughly Modern Millie.” He also worked in opera, dance and regional theater.

headline.seo: Martin Pakledinaz, Costume Designer, Dies at 58
headline.main: Martin Pakledinaz, Costume Designer, Dies at 58
headline.print_headline: Martin Pakledinaz, Costume Designer, Dies at 58
